subject: Davis Cup
Tennis
lead_paragraph: John Isner’s big serve and solid forehand proved too strong for Jo-Wilfried Tsonga in a 6-3, 7-6 (4) 5-7, 6-3 victory in Roquebrune, France, to put the United States into the Davis Cup semifinals.
snippet: John Isner’s big serve and solid forehand proved too strong for Jo-Wilfried Tsonga in a 6-3, 7-6 (4) 5-7, 6-3 victory in Roquebrune, France, to put the United States into the Davis Cup semifinals.
